to.sven.androidrccar.client.logic.contract

Interface IClientLogicListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILogicListener

    public interface IClientLogicListener
extends ILogicListener
    The ClientLogic uses this listener to inform the implementor of this interface that something happens. (Usually an Activity)
    Author:
    sven
